original_text: Rehoboam made himself humble. So the Lord did not destroy him. He stopped being angry with Rehoboam. He caused good things to happen in Judah.
korean_text: 르호보암이 스스로 겸비하였고 유다에 선한 일도 있으므로 여호와께서 노를 돌이키사 다 멸하지 아니하셨더라

sentences.original_text: So the Lord did not destroy him.
He stopped being angry with Rehoboam.
He caused good things to happen in Judah.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 유다에 좋은 일들이 일어나게 하셨다.
